To: enquiry@ha.org.hk
Subject: Possible Malicious Network Activity

Dear HA Administrator,

I am writing on behalf of Network Hong Kong Limited regarding a concerning issue of possible malicious network activity at HA's headquarters.

On July 10, 2024, our security team conducted a routine log data examination of the Hospital Authority's network. During this analysis, one of our security specialists discovered a significant and abnormal increase in data traffic on July 7, 2024, where a substantial amount of data was being sent from HA's headquarters to an unknown IP address. This suspicious network activity raises concerns of potential malicious intent, prompting us to reach out to you via this email.

To assist you in understanding the situation further, we have attached the analytic report detailing this malicious activity. Please review the report and feel free to reach out if you have any questions or require additional information. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Sincerely,
John Kim

Network Hong Kong Limited
